title: Conscience of an Industry: An Interview with Shundrawn Thomas
itunes:title: Conscience of an Industry: Interview with Shundrawn Thomas
description: Join David Iglesias as he interviews Shundrawn Thomas, President of Northern Trust Asset Management, where they explore a wide range of topics including: Shundrawn’s personal path to business success, the importance of family, lessons on leadership, insights on racism, his new book Discover Joy in Work, and potential opportunities stemming from our current COVID–19 crisis.
content:encoded: Join David Iglesias as he interviews Shundrawn Thomas, President of Northern Trust Asset Management, where they explore a wide range of topics including: Shundrawn’s personal path to business success, the importance of family, lessons on leadership, insights on racism, his new book Discover Joy in Work, and potential opportunities stemming from our current COVID–19 crisis.
itunes:subtitle: Interview with Shundrawn Thomas
itunes:author: Wheaton College
